Reference

All functions

aggregate_to_monthly()

Aggregates the sub-monthly data in a riversCentralAsia data set to monthly data.

AizensGlacierFunctions()

Estimates glacier surface area and glacier volume.

assess_fc_qual()

Assesses the quality of decadal or monthly forecasts as done in Central Asian Hydrometeorological Agencies.

biasCorrect_ERA5_CHELSA()

Extracts ERA5 basin domain from ERA5 raster bricks and scales fields with PBCORR CHELSA data so that monthly totals match. Writes resulting bias corrected (scaled) data bricks to a (newly) created subdirectory where the raw ERA5 data files are stored.

ChirchikRiverBasin

Discharge, precipitation and temperature in the Chirchik river basin, Uzbekistan.

climateScenarioPreparation_RMAWGEN()

Climate Scenario Preparations

computeAnnualFlowDurationCurve()

Computes the annual flow duration curve of a river discharge data set.

computeDiurnalTemperatureCycle()

Using ERA5 hourly data, the function computes the diurnal temperature cycle for each station.

convert2HYY()

Converts monthly hydro-meteorological time-series data to hydrological year values.

cutRaster2Basin()

Cutting raster file to basin shape with reprojection

decadeMaker()

Creates a vector of decadal (10 days) dates

doQuantileMapping_Tobi()

Performs a quantile mapping bias correction

downscale_ClimPred_monthly_BasinElBands()

Downscaling monthly climate predicitons to basin elevation bands

ErazovsGlacierFunction()

Estimates glacier surface area and glacier volume.

generateHourlyFromDaily_PT()

Generate hourly precipitation and temperature time series from daily data

generateSeqDates()

POSIXct date sequence generator

generate_ERA5_Subbasin_CSV()

Extract subbasin-level and elevation band-specific hourly time series from ERA5 raster bricks

gen_basinElevationBands()

Generate basin elevation bands from DEM

gen_HRU_Climate_CSV_RSMinerve()

Extract hydrological response unit HRU specific climate time series from nc-files.

glacierArea_Erasov()

Calculates glacier area from glacier volume

glacierArea_RGIF()

Calculates glacier area based on glacier volume

glacierBalance()

Calculate glacier mass balance of all glaciers in a basin over time.

glacierDischarge_HM()

Estimates the total glacier discharge based on glacier thinning rates

glacierImbalAbl()

Estimates the imbalance ablation based on the total glacier discharge

glacierMelt_TI()

Glacier melt computed with a temperature index model

glacierVolume_Erasov()

Calculates glacier volume from glacier area.

glacierVolume_RGIF()

Calculates glacier volume based on glacier area

hyear()

Calculates the hydrological year for a given date

import_iEasyHydro_data()

Import iEasyHydro Data

loadTabularData()

Load Tabular Hydro-Meteorological Data

load_minerve_input_csv()

Reads climate and discharge data into a tibble.

monDateSeq()

Create a monthly sequence date vector with end of month day dates

monthlyNorms_ClimateScenario()

Compute Monthly Norm of Min. and Max. Temperature and Precipitation of a Climate Scenario

OerlemansGlacierLengthModel()

Calculates glacier length following Oerleman 2005.

OerlemansGlacierLengthModel_FormatLong()

Calculates glacier length following Oerleman 2005.

%>%

Pipe graphics

plotAnnualFlowDurationCurve()

plot the annual flow duration curve of a river discharge data set.

plotNormDevHYY()

Helper function to plot value deviations from norms for entire hydrological years and cold and warm seasons.

posixct2rsminerveChar()

Function to convert POSIXCT-dates to a character representation as required by RSminerve

prepare_RMAWGEN_input_data()

Prepare RMAWGEN input files from RS MINERVE data file that contains hourly observations

riversCentralAsia-package

Accompanying R Package to Applied Modeling of Hydrological Systems in Central Asia Course

stepWiseGlacierBalance()

Glacier volume change over time for small glaciers < 1km2

stepWiseGlacierBalancePerElBand()

Glacier volume change over time

vignette_estimate_glacier_lengths

Example data for vignette Estimateing glacier lengths in Central Asia

wgen_daily_PT()

Compute stochastic daily weather time series using RMAWGEN and a climate scenario

wgen_daily_summaryStats()

wgen_daily_summaryStats

Contents
